text: The area of Hiyama District in Hiyama Subprefecture. is a district located in Hiyama Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 21,896 and a density of 19.59 persons per km². The total area is 1,117.57 km². ==Towns and villages== *Assabu *Esashi *Kaminokuni Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Hiyama District, Hokkaido
